name: Bubble Shoot Kingdom
description:
Bubble Shoot Kingdom is one of the most popular bubble shooter game!
Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles will make them fall down and burst!

- Shoot bubbles by tapping your screen
- Keep your combo will get bonus time
- Delicate and well designed bubbles
- More than 500 unique levels
- Receive free gift and boosters
- Compete with friends anytime
- Continuously update challenging levels
